channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: Notice
item.description: Spoc.unimi.it, servicemanagement.unimi.it, InformaStudenti and reclamistudenti.unimi.it will be unavailable from Friday 7 June 2 pm to Monday 10 June 2 pm.%0A

item.title: Special Other Foreign Languages Test session¬†dedicated to soon-to-be graduates in the summer session
item.description: The SLAM Centre is running a special advanced English/Anglo-American, basic and advanced French, basic and advanced Spanish, basic and advanced German test session dedicated to soon-to-be graduates in the Summer session. The test is being held in person at the room 700, 46 G. Colombo Street ‚Äì Milan on the following day:%0A‚Ä¢ 21st May 2024 at 9.30 am%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Call for CELI exams - A2, B1, B2 and C1 levels on 18+19 June 2024
item.description: The call is open to register for the CELI 1 A2, CELI 2 B1, CELI 3 B2 and CELI 4 C1 exams scheduled on 18+19 June 2024.%0APLEASE NOTE: seats for all levels are sold out.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Call for admissions to Collegio di Milano - a. y. 2024-2025
Study awards (type A-B-C) in memory of Professor Clementina Gatti. a.y. 2023/2024
item.description: For the academic year 2023/2024, the University is giving out three study awards (type A-B-C) in memory of Professor Clementina Gatti.%0AFor further information, check out the calls for applications on the dedicated pages.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it
